resources.string: You want to send a payment of %1$s to %2$s, with a fee %3$s?
It has been impossible to decrypt the wallet. Is %1$s the PIN that you used to encrypt the wallet?
Heyy! you need %1$s more to sent this payment.

Copy this list of words and store them in a safe place. The order of the words is important. This list serves so that you can generate your wallet if you lose or change your device. Is in your hands the safety of your money.\n\n %1$s

Great! Only need to encrypt your wallet. We\'re going to encrypt your wallet with a 4-digit PIN. Once encrypted your wallet, no one except one who knows this PIN can send money. There is No way to retrieve the PIN if you lose, so make sure to being to remember or you will lose your money.
Your wallet has been encrypted without problems!
Please enter the Creativecoin address of destination
This transaction has a commission of %1$s
The amount is too small to be sent
You don\'t have enough money Your are missing %1$s
You have entered the pin incorrectly too many times.
The transaction is ready to be sent. You will need to provide your PIN to sign the transaction.
Has not been able to sign the transaction because the signature key is invalid.
There are other transactions pending that have already spent the funds.

If you activate this option you will delete all downloaded data in your wallet, including the transactions of the Creativecoin received. Once enabled, your wallet will synchronize with the network Creativecoin download all blocks that exist in the Creativecoin network. This process will cost several minutes, depending on your network connection. We recommend you to download only by wifi. Do you want to enable this option anyway?
Welcome to your new Creativechain wallet

\tCreativechain is a decentralized platform for the registration and distribution of content that certifies the authorship and license of any work or creation making them indelible. A tool for the empowerment of artists and all kinds of creative people who produce, share and distribute digital content. The platform applies the power of attorney of the revolutionary Blockchain technology in the process of registering content to create incorruptible time stamps that certify the intellectual property of any digital work.
Create a new wallet with new addresses
Creates a wallet from list of words.
We have not found any transactions
Up to now we have not found any incoming transactions or outgoing of this wallet.
Click on the button below to add a Creativecoin address to the list.
Commission of transactions per KB. Transactions with commissions low and takes longer to be confirmed.
Extract the code mnemonic of the wallet (list of words).
Currency exchange used to show the value of your Creativecoins.
It disconnects from the network when it detects inactivity. It reconnects automatically after 15 minutes.
Displays the exchange value on the main screen.
Allows sending money from transactions that are not yet confirmed.
Do you remember the date you created this wallet? Synchronization can be much faster if you indicate the date. If you are not sure you can skip this step.
Indicates the language of the words

To improve the security of your wallet, you need to re-enter the 4-digit PIN you created. We will improve the encryption of your wallet with a new security system that will provide greater robustness.
Attention! This action replaces an already issued transaction but increases the commission by subtracting it from the amount sent to the recipient.
This transaction was issued to increase the fee of another transaction.
For security, retype the words previously shown. Order is important.
The detected seed does not match with the generated seed.
A backup of a previous wallet has been detected. If you create a new wallet this backup will be deleted. Do you want to recover the wallet from the backup?

This function allows you to check if a CREA address belongs to this wallet. It is useful when you do not know if a transaction address is in your wallet. Of course, paper wallet addresses will never belong in your wallet.
The address belongs to this wallet!
The address does not belong in this wallet
The wallet is trying to connect to the network. Wait a minute.
The seed could not be exported.
